report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts for a CMS user
report.description: Gives a total number of species and occurrences recorded by a user identified by their CMS login user ID.
report.query: SELECT cast(date_part('year', s.date_start) as character varying) as year, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values sav JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sa.id=sav.sample_attribute_id AND sa.deleted=false AND sa.caption='CMS Username' ) ON sav.sample_id=s.id AND sav.deleted=false WHERE o.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(sav.text_value AS character varying)='#username#' OR s.recorder_names='#username#') GROUP BY year, website_id UNION SELECT 'Total' as year, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values sav JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sa.id=sav.sample_attribute_id AND sa.deleted=false AND sa.caption='CMS Username' ) ON sav.sample_id=s.id AND sav.deleted=false WHERE o.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(sav.text_value AS character varying)='#username#' OR s.recorder_names='#username#') AND '#include_total#'!='no'

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: username
param.description: Enter the name or username of the recorder.
